Desc.entry: Part of the Redeemed Christian Church of God which is an international network of Churches. A multicultural church based in the heart of the city at John street opposite Sheffield United Football Club. A church with relevant teaching, heartfelt worship, exuberant praise, genuine community and cultural diversity. Has various group initiatives which reach out to the diverse peoples of the city. 'Revolution' is a students' group which aims to build young adults who make a difference in their community. A drop-in centre for the homeless and those in need. 'Achievers' which is essentially about building women that pray, act and build others. Runs a children's church and youth group known as the 'Mighty Ones'. The Mighty Ones aims to help teenagers deal with the issues surrounding them in their schools and communities while building a deeper relationship with Jesus. Also hosts a variety of conferences and events during the year including an International Carol service which celebrates Christmas traditions from around the world every December, a worship extravaganza in February 'Psalms Alive' and an annual 'Walking in Victory' conference every October.
